suggestedTasks.title: Validate Supabase Migration Deployment Process
suggestedTasks.description:
Develop a comprehensive test suite to validate Supabase migration deployment workflow. Create integration tests that verify:
- Migration scripts execute correctly
- Schema changes are applied as expected
- No unintended side effects during migration
Focus on the create_booking_schema migration specifically.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure reliable migration process and schema creation

suggestedTasks.title: Document Supabase Project Linking Procedure
suggestedTasks.description:
Create clear documentation for Supabase project linking and migration processes. Include:
- Step-by-step CLI linking instructions
- Troubleshooting common configuration issues
- Best practices for managing migrations in monorepo environment
Target developers who may be unfamiliar with Supabase configuration.
suggestedTasks.reason: Improve team knowledge and onboarding for Supabase migrations

patterns: Use Supabase CLI for project linking
gotchas: Potential CLI hanging in non-interactive environments
